thread.title: China opens its very own Hollywood

title: China opens its very own Hollywood
text:
China opens its very own Hollywood 8:21pm IST - 01:40
China's Wanda Group has opened a sprawling film studio complex in Qingdao, which has been touted as China's answer to Hollywood. The company plans to transform the port city into a global film production hub. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
China's Wanda Group has opened a sprawling film studio complex in Qingdao, which has been touted as China's answer to Hollywood. The company plans to transform the port city into a global film production hub.
